text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Interesting you're having a rally in Tulsa to beg Black voters to like you.
Interesting you're having attendees sign a waiver in case they contract Covid-19 at your rally.
Interesting that Sleepy Joe Biden is going to kick your sirry ass in Nov.
Yep, interesting.
#dumptrump2020
